definition: a group of many things in the air or on the ground, move in large numbers
details:
noun
- a group of many things in the air or on the ground
= example: a group of many things in the air or on the ground
= synonyms: cloud
- a moving crowd
= synonyms: drove
verb
- move in large numbers
= synonyms: stream
- be teeming, be abuzz
= example: be teeming, be abuzz
= synonyms: pullulate, teem
